item.title: Sometimes answers are hidden in plain sight! ðŸŒ…
item.author: cipherchallenge@um6p.ma (Cipher Challenge 2025 Cryptography Edition)
item.description:
1. Answers to all the challenges are hidden in the corresponding images. If you reverse-engineer the code in https://github.com/cipherchallenge/steganography you’ll find them!

Hint: the space is full of pixels and a pixel does not need all the bits! Some are less significant ðŸ˜‰
